10084000.「……なんだ オマエ。ニンゲンか？\n カエレカエレ！\n ニンゲンなんか どっ:
What are you, a human? Get out of here, get
out of here! Human, go away!

10084001.「あーっ！ <pc>！\n ゲンキだったカ？ ボクはゲンキだぞ！\n まー ゆっ:
Ahhhh! ! You're a good guy, right? I'm fine! Well, take your time! I see Himea and Erju every once in a while and talk
to them offline! They're both doing great, so I'm doing great too! And next time I'll... let's see... what's it called? I also write
letters! I'm studying complicated letters!

36115.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「人間よ！ 何し:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>It's HUMAN! What are you doing here? I would
have let you rust my sword! Get out of here!

45075.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr><turn_pc:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr><turn_pc>Human. I won't say anything bad. Now, get out
of here.

36117.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「おいおい ちょ:
Hey, hey, wait a minute. That's pretty funny that a human would approach me so casually, isn't it? Are you trying to pick a fight with
me? If you don't want to see the pain, turn around and get lost!

36118.「我らがリーダー ガミルゴ様のためなら\n オレは よろこんで命を差しだすよ。\:
I would gladly give my life for the sake of
our leader, Gamilgo. He will protect us Dwarfs
with his life.

36119.「神は 分けへだてなく 人間の声にも\n その耳を かたむけるでしょう。<bw_:
God will not divide, but will listen to the
voice of the human being.<bw_break>

36120.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「チッ！ 人間か:
<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>Damn! Human! Just looking at you makes me want
to go away! Go away!

36121.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「人間め！ なん:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>Human! What do you want? Master Gamilgo does
not speak with humans! If you don't want to be
cut down, get lost!

36122.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「わははは！ 人:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Ha-ha-ha! You've got some backbone coming
here, Human. I like you. Your recklessness is
just like my old friend. But he's dead now.

36123.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「人間が なんの:
What do humans want? Only Ogre and Dwarf live in this Wild Settlement. This is no place for you. If you don't want to die, leave as soon
as possible.

36124.「商売に 種族は関係ありませんよ。\n でも 人間に売ったことは\n ヒミツに:
Races have nothing to do with business. But
please keep it a secret that you sold to
human.<bw_break>

36125.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「どうせ あたいらは:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>We are doomed to burn and die anyway. I've
already accepted death.

36126.「ここは 人間ギライが多いけど \n うちだけは 人間も泊めてあげてるよ。<bw:
I know there are a lot of humanSizzi here, but
we are the only place that allows humans to
stay.<bw_break>

36127.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「ふん。私は 世:
Hmm. I came to Ogreed Continent for the great project of connecting the world with the Iron Road. But because of you humans, it's all
ruined!

38893.ランドンクイナは\n氷鳥のはねを 落としていった。\n<auto_br=5000:
Apeckalypse dropped Icebird Feather.
<auto_br=5000>
<pc> received Icebird Feather (Key
Item)!<se_nots System Item>

36128.「我らがリーダー ガミルゴ様のためなら\n オレは よろこんで命を差しだすよ。\:
I would gladly give my life for the sake of our leader, Gamilgo. Unlike the leaders of the human race, he is willing to risk his life to
protect us Dwarfs.

36129.「人間が なんの用だ？\n この荒野の集落には 我らオーガと\n ドワーフしか:
What do humans want? Only Ogre and Dwarf live in this Wild Settlement. What? You want to talk to Master Gamilgo? I don't think Master
Gamilgo would talk to a human in the center tent.

36130.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「我らの気持ちを:
The boy's disregard for our feelings and his rude words and actions are beyond forgivable. It's unforgivable. If Master Gamilgo hadn't
stopped him, I would have slit his throat. I won't let you off the hook if anything happens to the little girl.

36131.<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>「くそったれめ…:
Son of a bitch. It's not raining. It's only a matter of time before we die out. But I don't intend to die like this. I'm going to let the
humans know how much I care about them.

36132.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「水がない大地に:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>The suffering of living on a land without
water. The humans who have water can't
understand it. This is the very land of death.

36133.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「ちっきしょー！:
Damn it! You human! You're sitting in Glen Castle, drinking the water all by yourselves! I can't take it anymore! I'm going to let the
humans see what I can do to Glen Castle!

36134.「故郷を奪われ 我らの気持ちが\n どれほど 踏みにじられたか\n あのエルジュ:
It seems that Erju has no idea how much our feelings were trampled upon when our homeland was taken from us. Humans are such pathetic
racists who can only see things according to their own convenience. Please be careful, young lady.

36135.「あの小僧……。\n ベルンハルトに よく似てやがる。\n こっちまで 毒気を抜:
That kid. He looks a lot like Bernhardt. He's got me all twisted up, too. Hey human, I'll go along with your story. If you really give Glen
Castle back to us, we'll do the inheritance ceremony. Garmy! You better keep your eyes peeled to see if the kid can pull this off. Go
back to Glen Castle and try to convince Theodore. If you can.

36136.「この 荒野の集落には\n 我らオーガと ドワーフが住んでいる。\n 用が済んだ:
This Wild Settlement is where we, Ogre and
Dwarf, live. If you've done what you had to
do, leave as soon as you can.

36137.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「どうせ あたいらは:
We are doomed to burn and die anyway. I've already accepted death. But what I can't forgive is the humans. It's outrageous to take
over Glen Castle while everyone else is suffering.

36138.「あのエルジュとかいう小僧。\n グレン城を返還させるなどと ずいぶん\n 威勢:
That little Erju. He has been talking so brazenly about returning Glen Castle to us. But the deep gulf between us and the humans
will not be easily bridged. I am afraid that I can no longer avoid it.

36139.「お嬢から 話は聞いているぞ。\n<br>\n「真の勇気とは なんなのか\n お:
The young lady told me about you. She said you
and Erju taught her what true courage is. I'm
grateful.

36140.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「よお 有名人。:
Hey, celebrity. I know who you are. I heard you beat the shit out of Reidametes. It's been a while since it rained, so I could drink a
lot of water. That was the best water I've ever had.

36141.「シオドーアと エルジュたちが\n やってきて グレン城を返還することを\n ガ:
Theodore and Erju came and swore to Gamilgo that they would return Glen Castle. I thought it was the humans trying to get us to do
something. We were in an uproar.

36142.「ガミルゴ様のもとに いたかったが\n そろそろ 故郷が恋しくなってきたからな。:
We wanted to stay with Gamilgo, but we are starting to miss home. We Dwarfs have decided to return to Dwachakka Continent. I can't wait
to dig in the soil there.

36143.「やれやれ いくさにならないで よかった。\n ムダな血が流れずに 済んだからね:
Oh well, I'm glad I didn't get sick. No blood
was spilled. We didn't start the IKOs because
we wanted to. It's best to have no conflict.

36144.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「お前たちの勇気:
Your courage has changed the hearts of the humans who hate us and the hearts of the humans who envy us. The hearts of the humans
who despise us and the hearts of the humans who envy us. It's thanks to you that we can see the smile on the young lady's face. We are
grateful. Savior , we will not forget you. We will never forget you.

36145.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「わはははは！:
Ha-ha-ha-ha! This one got me! We had planned to drown the Someday Sun in the sea with the rest of the surgeons. But if we had, we would
have gotten off scot-free. I thought humans were such vile races, but I'm surprised at your courage. I'm totally amazed! Oh, yeah.
Ever since Garmiy came back, all I could talk about was you and Erju Himea. It seems the villagers have learned a lot about courage
from you.

36146.「ここは 荒野の集落だ。\n 和平が結ばれた今となっては\n 人間を 追い返す理:
This is the Wild Settlement. Now that peace has been made, there is no reason to turn human beings away. I'm sorry I've been so rude
to you. If you're tired, go get some rest.

36147.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「みんな 元気に:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Now that we are all healthy again, we will do
our business with vigor.<bw_break>

36148.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「あんたが あの:
I heard you destroyed that sun. That explosion was amazing. Dazzling light filled the sky. I thought Human was gutless, but to pull off
something that big is amazing! I'm amazed!

36149.「私は 世界を 鉄の道でつなぐという\n 一大プロジェクトのために\n このオー:
I have come to Ogreed Continent for the great Rojekt of connecting the world with the Iron Road. Now I can finally return to Glen Castle
and resume my Rojekt. I thank you, human.
